Hitmonchan (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0106: Hitmonlee
Pokémon
#0108: Lickitung →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Hitmonchan (TCG Pocket).

Hitmonchan has been featured on 17 different cards since it debuted in the Base Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Hitmonchan cards are normally Fighting-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Hitmonchan

Hitmonchan
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
